name: test tourney
description: this is where teh description goes
pool_play_description:
Pool Play Format
2 games per round, 4 rounds total

6v6 Matches
Libero allowed, no typewriting

Seeding System
By record, then point differential, then strength of schedule
bracket_play_description:
Best of 3 Format
Games to 25 points, win by 2

Game 3 Tiebreaker
First to 15 points

Double Elimination Bracket
Teams must lose twice to be eliminated

name: Two Peas Pod - December 2025
description: Inviting volleyball players of all skill levels to connect, play, and compete!
rules_description:
Net Height

Women's regulation height (7'4â…›") - lower net, higher fun!
Male Player Restrictions

    Cannot attack from front row above net height
    Cannot block at the net
    Can attack from behind the 10-foot line
    Can jump serve

Scoring

Rally scoring to 21 points.
prize_info:
$25 Registration Fee

Winning team gets their registration fee back!

Play for free and bragging rights
pool_play_description:
12 Pods of 2 Players
18 total players divided into partnerships
6v6 Matches
3 pods per side, 3 pods rest each round
Seeding by Point Differential
Pods ranked 1-12 after pool play
bracket_play_description:
4 Teams of 6 Players
Seeds 1+7+12, 2+6+10, 3+6+9, 4+5+11
Balanced Team Formation
Top, middle, and bottom seeds combined
Double Elimination
Everyone must lose twice to be eliminated
